body.name: 2pcs Silicone Cover for Stanley Quencher Adventure H2.0 40 oz Tumbler, Protective Silicone Boot, Stanley accessories (Clear)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 5 hrs 2 mins
features: A Must Have for Your Bottles: Avoid unwanted scratches, dings, or dents with this extra layer of protection during outdoor or indoor adventures, extend the life of your bottle.It's the perfect stainless steel water bottle accessory for your active, on-the-go lifestyle. Perfect for all sport and outdoor activities.

Perfect Fit: Our cup boot is designed to fit perfectly on Stanley Quincher Adventure 40oz Tumbler with Handle & Stanley IceFlow 20oz 30oz, Also fits 12 to 24oz bottle. It's precisely made to fit the cup bottom and won't fall off easily.
Easy to Use & Clean: Simply wipe the surface of your thumblers clean and dry, then slowly put the bottle boot on and squeeze out the air.

Ideal for Gift Giving: You'll receive two pieces of silicone boots, one for yourself and one for family, friends. Protect your water bottles at school, outdoors, fitness, home, office. Make an excellent choice for holiday gifts!
What You Get: 2pcs Clear color Stanley Silicone boot, welcome guide, our worry-free 18-month warranty, and friendly customer service.

Why we love this product. Stylish silicone sleeve prevents slipping Protects your beautiful bottles from breakage Make your love bottle colorful HOW TO CARE FOR YOUR SILICONE SLEEVES To prolong the life of silicone sleeves, and keep them in a tip top condition, please follow these tips… Wash immediately after use. Dishwasher safe. If washing by hand, wash the silicone sleeves with warm water and a mild detergent. Use baking soda remove stains. For deep cleaning and sanitizing, The silicone sleeves can be boiled in water for a few minutes. It is no necessary to remove the silicone sleeve from bottles for washing. Package content: 2pcs x Silicone Boot This will be one of your coolest purchases ever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not only are these cute, very Practical!
reviews.reviewText: These not only add a pop of color to your tumbler, they also easily pop on/off most all tumblers. Great gift idea & no worries about the tumbler being slammed too hard on your furniture with these rubber stoppers. Good investment for your pricey cups and fits into cup holders much easier. Highly Recommended 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits nice, and protective
reviews.reviewText: Like the color, and fit perfectly on my cup. Have not dropped my cup yet to see how protective it is, but i do like that it helps prevent the dinging and slight banging when I place it down. I do have cats and dogs whose hair stick to it but it happen with this material.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Serves the purpose.
reviews.reviewText: Size was right, fitted well for Stanley tumbler and also for glass spray bottles. They hold well without slipping out and prevents noise as of placing on a surface.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this after seeing a coworker that had the base guard for the Stanley 40oz. I love the fact it's got a shoulder strap, the neoprene keeps your drink extra insulated and the cup finish protected. At first I was worried I wouldn't love the grey color, but it came I'm so glad I got it. I hides dirt, wear and scuffs. The straw "cloud" protector is super cute and tight.This is an overpriced and heavy cup. In order to keep the "investment" of it in good shape while still getting good use of it, this neoprene strap is a must. It's got everything I need, although I wish the front pocket was as large as the phone holder for a small card wallet.I would recommend this product to everyone that has this cup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like a charm!!
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I was looking for to keep my tumbler from being scratched underneath! It fits perfectly with my Stanley Cup 40 oz Quencher H2.0 tumbler. It’s made of a flexible rubber material that makes it easy to slip under the tumbler and my cup stands great with it. I got the clear color one and it does not disappoint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It fits nicely but does feel like an air bubble at the bottom after it’s been placed. It does the job & if I bump it by accident then there is no show of anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These were purchased for my daughters 3 different size Stanley's and they fit them all perfectly. Good quality, great price and relieved them quickly. I would buy more items.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these for my Stanley! I hate it when things get scratched and these are the perfect way to prevent scratches on the bottom or the sides of the cup! It was nice that it came in a two pack so that I could put one on my husband Stanley as well! It does fit the 40 ounce straw cup Stanley!
